column4: Totem can play everything, once you get the right codecs installed (which is easy)
burn ISOs in Nautilus, it works flawlessly here
OK, I missed that you weren't using Ubuntu; I've used k3b myself and it is good - but (at least in Ubuntu) for ISOs it's not needed anymore
yeah, but the way I phrased it is far more flameworthy! :P
